title: Family Resources
name: Family Resources
description: This map lists the resources available for families in Carrollton.

properties.name: St Margaret's Outreach
properties.description: Our office is temporarily located at 305 Tanner St., Carrollton.  After construction is completed, office will return to 606 Newnan St., Carrollton (late 2012).

properties.name: Carrollton Cultural Art Center
properties.description: Provides the community with a wide variety of fine art opportunities through: visual arts, music, theatre, dance, and literary arts. We produce 14 plays, 2 choral concerts, a youth orchestra, 2 art galleries with monthly exhibitions, an active artist guild, community theatre, community chorus, creative writing club, and numerous classes and workshops for people of all ages, all abilities, and all income levels. We are also a resource for outside groups wishing to produce art programming on their own.

properties.name: Crime Prevention Unit
properties.description:
115 W Center StCarrollton, GA 30117Provides
services to the community and businesses by teaching programs geared toward
their needs.

properties.name: Carroll County Ferst Foundation
properties.description: P.O.Box 1922 Carrollton, GA 30112Organization dedicated to getting books and literacy support services into the homes of young children, at absolutely no cost to the family, to prepare all Georgia preschool children for reading and learning success.www.carrollferst.com

properties.name: Pregnancy Resource Center
properties.description: http://www.pregnancyrc.com/about.html --List all the free programs available. Hours: M/T/TH 10am-4pm, W 1pm-4pm   *Call for appointment*

properties.name: West Georgia Rape Crisis Center
properties.description:
129 E Center StCarrollton, GA 30117Provides
victim services and prevention awareness education related to sexual violence.
Assistance is available on a 24 hour basis by calling crisis
line # 770-834-7273.Services
include crisis intervention, medical and/or criminal justice accompaniment, and information /referral services related to sexual violence.

Hours
M-F 9am-5pm

properties.name: Carroll County Emergency Shelter
properties.description: Domestic violence victims, Emergency Hotline (770) 834- 1141 24/7Victims must call emergency number for assistance.

properties.name: Exodus Cry
properties.description: Lori Stewartlrr7@bellsouth.netMinisters to victims of human trafficking and modern day slavery. National Human Trafficking Resource Center 1-888-373-7888 24/7 Call this number if you think you have encountered a victim of human trafficking.

properties.name: Impact International
properties.description: 415 Newnan RdCarrollton, GA 30117(770) 834-4007HOPE (also called 415 HOPE Center) the home for homeless men and ACE (Adult & Community Education Center) is where all the literacy, tutoring, and class are held
